<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77528</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d0a7916c-1113-4d6a-81f8-7dbfbb58fe00#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Aranyhal képe közelről</string>
            <string language="en">Goldfish's picture from a short distance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung des Goldfishs von einem kurzen Abstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'image du goldfish's d'une distance courte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato do goldfish de uma distância curta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine del goldfish da una distanza corta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα Goldfish από μια σύντομη απόσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro del goldfish de una distancia corta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az aranyhalról készült felvételen jól látszanak az úszósugarak</string>
            <string language="en">Swimming rays are fully visible on the shot taken on the goldfish</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">halak,  csontos halak,  sugarasúszójú halak,  mozgás,  </string>
            <string language="en">fish, bony fish, fish with radiate fins, movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwimmenstrahlen sind auf dem Schuß völlig 
sichtbar, der auf dem Goldfish genommen wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les rayons de natation sont entièrement visibles
sur le projectile pris sur le goldfish</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os raios da natação são inteiramente visíveis
no tiro feito exame no goldfish</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I raggi di swimming sono completamente visibili 
sul colpo preso sul goldfish</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι κολυμπώντας ακτίνες είναι πλήρως ορατές στο πλάνο
που λαμβάνεται στο goldfish</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los rayos de la natación son completamente 
visibles en el tiro tomado en el goldfish</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fischen Sie, knöcherne Fische, Fische mit ausstrahlen 
Flossen, Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pêchez, les poissons osseux, poissons avec rayonnent 
des ailerons, mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesque, os peixes ósseos, peixes com radiate aletas, 
movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peschi, pesci ossuti, pesci con irradiano le alette, 
movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τα ψάρια, κοκκαλόψαρα, ψάρια με ακτινοβολούν τα πτερύγια, 
μετακίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pesque, los pescados huesudos, pescados con irradian las
aletas, movimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77528</entry>
    </identifier>
